MedicalBill - Class in information
This class represents a Medical Bill or Transaction Receipt Used when issuing bills to patient for payment

Constructs a Transaction Receipt
MedicalBillDataManager - Class in management
A DataManager for Medical Bill or Transaction Receipts that implements interface DataManager Collect data from CSV file with BufferedReader and write back to CSV file with BufferedWriter for the data collected for the Transaction Reference in String Holds all the data type MedicalBill
MedicalBillDataManager() - Constructor for class management.MedicalBillDataManager
Constructs an MedicalBillDataManager filePath for the directory of the CSV retrieveAll() to retrieve all the data from CSV and instantiate each of the data to type MedicalBill when app begin and finally, add each data to transactionList
